about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a software engineer with 15+ years of experience working across banking, consulting, energy, and insurance. As a Senior Software Engineer at Pariveda Solutions, I help teams work better together while building apps that solve real business problems.

What drives me is turning messy, complicated business challenges into clean, working solutions. I think differently than most people - I like to find new ways to solve old problems, even if it means taking some calculated risks along the way. My teams know they can count on me to speak up when something isn't working and to push through roadblocks until we get results.

I work best when I can dig into the technical details, spot patterns in data, and figure out how complex systems actually work. I'm the type of person who prefers to work independently, but I also know when to collaborate and when to teach others what I've learned. I say what I mean and mean what I say - no fluff, just straight talk about what needs to happen.

personalityTraits.title: How I Work Best
traits: I think outside the box and come up with original solutions others might not see
I'm willing to take smart risks when I believe in the outcome
I cut through complexity to find the real problem that needs solving
I communicate directly - you'll always know where you stand with me
I work well on my own but also enjoy mentoring and teaching others
When I set a goal, I stick with it until it's done, even when it gets tough

items.title: AI Crisis Management API
items.description: Built a smart API that helps crisis management teams get the right information fast. The old system was just a handbook - now it's an intelligent service that knows what you need and gives you the right answers for emergency situations.

items.title: Help Desk System Upgrade
items.description: Our team was drowning in emails from a single inbox. I led the move to Jira Service Desk and built dashboards that show what's actually happening. Now we solve problems 50-60% faster because we can see patterns and track everything properly.

items.title: Champagner Messaging App
items.description: Built a mobile app that lets businesses send mass messages to their customers. The app made over $50K in just 4 months and cut setup time in half by connecting everything to Google Cloud automatically.

items.title: Website Technology Upgrade
items.description: Led a team to move our old website from outdated Knockout.js to modern React. The new site loads faster, works better on phones, and is much easier for developers to update and maintain.

items.title: Data Pipeline Builder
items.description: Created tools that automatically pull data from different sources and put it all in one place. What used to take 2 weeks of manual work now happens in 2 days, and we can spot problems 50% faster.

items.title: Banking Product Development
items.description: At Infosys, I helped build one of the company's main banking products from the ground up. Worked with teams in India and Singapore to make sure everything worked smoothly for customers around the world.
